full_summary:
# CBSA - Smartphone-Based Facial Recognition Technology (FRT)

### Tender Details

- **Tender Reference (Numéro de rèference)**: WS4534554636
- **Publication Date (Date de publication)**: 2024-04-16
- **Tender Closing Date (Date de clôture)**: 2024-06-04T14:00:00 ED
- **Amendment Date (Date de modification)**: 2024-05-31

### Solicitation Opportunity

The Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) is seeking to acquire and test biometrics Facial Recognition Technology (FRT) solutions to evaluate their performance in the Canadian context. This procurement is subject to the National Security Exceptions (NSE), as per the trade agreements.

### Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation of proposals will be based on the combined rating of technical merit and price. Proposals must demonstrate compliance with the requirements outlined in the ITQ document.

### Eligibility and Security Requirements

 To be eligible, the respondent must be located in a country that is a member of the North Atlantic Treaty Organization (NATO) or the Five Eyes alliance. 

### Deliverables and Timeline

Deliverables: Biometrics FRT solutions complying with the identified requirements in the ITQ document.

Timeline:
- **Contract Start Date (Date de début du contrat)**: Not specified
- **Contract End Date (Date de fin du contrat)**: Not specified

### Contact Information

- **Contracting Authority (Administration contractante)**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Representative (Représentant)**: David Tomei (SPAC/PSPC)
- **Email (Courriel)**: [david.tomei@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:david.tomei@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
- **Notice URL (URL de l'avis)**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19419266?extsite=MTk0MTkyNjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Additional Requirements

- **Security Clearance (Classement de sécurité)**: Required for the purpose of this procurement.
- **Attend a Biometrics Security Technical Requirements Briefing and an option at an ASFC facility (Atteindre une présentation sur les exigences techniques de la sécurité biométrique et une option pour se rendre au centre ASFC).
